arStrings.szText: Itâ€™s been an age since I saw Grelkar. There was a time when we were both trusted advisors to Tyrant King Brol, along with Zolmog and Molquarth.

But then, the pale man Elias freed us from Guulrahn's prison, and drove my people to even darker atrocities. When he bent Brol to his will, I dared speak the truth, that we were becoming pawns of Elias. But Grelkar and the others turned against me.
Earnest, and bitter at mention of Elias.
I fled for my life. Put my skills to use as a butcher and a mercenary. And swore off human flesh.
